metadata.title: Initialize Project Structure with ADK Foundation

story.iWant: to create the foundational directory structure and module organization
story.soThat: the codebase is organized logically, enabling modular development of Alice, Bob, and shared components.
story.tasks: - [ ] Task 1: Create Alice Companion Package (AC: 1, 2) - [ ] Subtask 1.1: Create `alice_companion` directory - [ ] Subtask 1.2: Create empty `alice_companion/__init__.py` - [ ] Task 2: Create Bob Companion Package (AC: 1, 2) - [ ] Subtask 2.1: Create `bob_companion` directory - [ ] Subtask 2.2: Create empty `bob_companion/__init__.py` - [ ] Task 3: Create Shared Package (AC: 1, 2) - [ ] Subtask 3.1: Create `shared` directory - [ ] Subtask 3.2: Create empty `shared/__init__.py` - [ ] Task 4: Create Application Entry Point (AC: 3) - [ ] Subtask 4.1: Create `app.py` with a basic "Hello World" or placeholder comment

story-context.acceptanceCriteria: 1. **Directory Structure Created**: The project root contains `alice_companion/`, `bob_companion/`, and `shared/` directories. 2. **Python Packages Initialized**: Each directory contains an `__init__.py` file to establish them as Python packages. 3. **Entry Point Placeholder**: An `app.py` file exists in the project root to serve as the future application entry point.

doc.title: Epic Technical Specification: Foundation & Project Setup
doc.snippet: | Module/Directory | Responsibility | | :--- | :--- | | `alice_companion/` | Package for Alice's agent code, MCP server, and client. | | `bob_companion/` | Package for Bob's agent code, MCP server, and client. | | `shared/` | Package for shared utilities, data models, and logger. | | `app.py` | Entry point for the Gradio application (placeholder/setup). |
